name: Caos (jottap)
description:
Caos is an entity wich travels around  the dimensions killing deities, demigods and monsters with the power available in each world to recover the balance in the universe.
In this demo, you will be killing a powerful monster in a forgotten world where he made it is home, killing every other life being.
Game Keys:
You can move around with W, A, S, D 

Sprint: HOLD SHIFT

Dash: F

Change skills with Q or E

Cast Spells on mouse click

Cast Heal : R
